```{r setup, include=FALSE}

    ordinalsimr_data <- readRDS("ordinalsimr_results.rds")
    unlockBinding("params", env = .GlobalEnv)
    params <- list()
    params$data_object <- ordinalsimr_data$comparison_data$distribution_plot
  })
}

```
